title: Solar Gains Momentum In Arizona Schools
teaser: Tucson public schools are installing solar panels at more than 40 of its campuses - one of the biggest school solar projects in the country.
contentencoded:
In Arizona, the Tucson Unified School District is installing solar panels at more than 40 of its campuses.

It’s one of the biggest solar projects of any school district in the country, and it has plenty of competition from other school across the Southwest.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Stina Sieg of KJZZ explains why.

  • Read more on this story via KJZZ
